title: .NET 10 Libraries Features
description: Collection topic covering key .NET 10 library improvements including numeric string comparison, WebSocket streaming APIs, JSON security enhancements, post-quantum cryptography, performance optimizations, span-based APIs, and stable tensor operations. Each feature gets concise treatment with practical examples for common scenarios.
